motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • Approval of October 10, 2022, City Council Special Called Meeting Minutes • Approval of October 10, 2022, City Council Meeting Minutes • Winters Chapel Path Phase 1 Streetlight Agreement with Georgia Power

motions.title: Motion to Remove Items from Table
motions.description: Motion to take items #6 and #7 (Park Master Plans) from the table.

motions.title: Park Master Plan for 5435 Roberts Drive Approval
motions.description: Approval of updated Park Master Plan for 5435 Roberts Drive with Option B selected to increase overall field size for multi-purpose use.

motions.title: Table Park Master Plan for 4809/4819 Vermack Road
motions.description: Motion to table the Park Master Plan for 4809/4819 Vermack Road.

motions.title: Grant Application for Cherry Hill-Eidson Road Multi-Use Trail
motions.description: Approval of 'Improving Neighborhood Outcomes in Disproportionally Impacted Communities' grant application for multi-use trail connecting Cherry Hill and Eidson Road with total project cost $100k funded by grant.

motions.title: Contract Amendment for Planning & Zoning Services
motions.description: Approval of contract amendment to Municipal Service Contract for Planning & Zoning Services adding temporary part-time position for 2.5 years.

publicHearings.title: Fiscal Year 2023 Budget Adoption
publicHearings.description: Second of two public hearings on proposed FY 2023 budget. No public comments for or against. Budget presented overview of city's financial status.

specialEvents.title: Administration of Oath of Office - Multiple Officers
specialEvents.description: Council Member Heneghan administered oath of office to Officers Elvin Arias, Emma Baukhages, and Prince Greene (Mayor Deutsch participated via Zoom).

discussionItems.title: Dunwoody Village Street Grid Project
discussionItems.description: Presentation of Dunwoody Village Street Grid proposed project with next step to return for approval of Development Agreement with Regency.

discussionItems.title: Technology Policy Adoption
discussionItems.description: Presentation of proposed technology policy with Council Member Heneghan noting some requirements as onerous.

discussionItems.title: Facility Usage Agreements with Athletic Association Partners
discussionItems.description: Presentation of Facility Usage Agreements with athletic association partners with request for written reports before end of year.

discussionItems.title: Adjusting Alcohol Licensing Requirements
discussionItems.description: Presentation of amendment to alcohol ordinance reducing food/alcohol requirement from 60%/40% to 50%/50% and adding separate category for personal improvement services and entertainment businesses.

discussionItems.title: Establish Sinking Fund Reserve for Artificial Turf Fields
discussionItems.description: Staff recommendation to establish $60,000 annual amount for sinking fund for artificial turf replacement.

notes: Vermack Park Master Plan tabled after resident concerns about path privacy and safety
Council requested 12-foot trail width for Cherry Hill-Eidson Road project
Multiple public comments opposing Vermack Park path proposal
